postName: T20 World Cup 2022: India record their highest successful run-chase against Pakistan in T20Is
postDescription: T20 World Cup 2022: India, captained by Rohit Sharma, chased down 160 off 20 overs after Virat Kohli stayed unbeaten on 82 runs off 53 balls at the iconic MCG.

postName: How Harry Potter's Hagrid AKA Robbie Coltrane passed away
postDescription: Scottish actor Robbie Coltrane, who played Hagrid in the Harry Potter films, passed away on October 14 at the age of 72. The reason for his death is reported to be multiple organ failure.
